author: Sophie Dahl
method: Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well. Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon. Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
ingredients: 70ml/2fl oz vodka or gin,  1 tbsp dry vermouth,  2 tbsp olive brine,  1 wedge of lemon,  1 green olive
